topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558a3e6b6368727a6d000670#post_558a3e6b6368727a6d000670
I just hope people don't explode over it. It probably _will_ happen, but still. 

The way I view gay marriage: Just integrate it into your life like how you did with straight marriage. My mother's bosses are homosexuals, and they've been together for ten years. Their anniversary was about a month ago, and that's an impressive milestone. They aren't married yet, and they are planning to journey to Hawaii to marry, only they are unable to because it's not permitted there...yet. They would really benefit from the Supreme Court passing the law.
